snippet: The Department of Agriculture said it had fined Harvard Medical School $24,000 for repeated animal welfare violations that have resulted in the deaths of four monkeys since 2011.
abstract: Agriculture Dept says it has fined Harvard Medical School $24,000 for repeated animal welfare violations at its research centers, resulting in the deaths of four monkeys since 2011.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Agriculture said it had fined Harvard Medical School $24,000 for repeated animal welfare violations that have resulted in the deaths of four monkeys since 2011.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Harvard Fined for Deaths of Research Monkeys
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Harvard Fined For Deaths of Research Monkeys
